Question: The rebels dispersed and there was no fighting, as this person's forceful action proved the new government could protect itself.
Hints: However, this person regarded the passage of the Intolerable Acts in 1774 as "an Invasion of our Rights and Privileges".
In battle, however, this person was repeatedly outmaneuvered by British generals with larger armies.
Lee's words set the standard by which this person's overwhelming reputation was impressed upon the American memory.
